content: @Brian Postlethwaite his has probably been asked a few times before but it just tripped me up and wondering why Encounter.class datatype is Coding and not CodeableConcept like in 95% of other resources? What is wrong with text or translations?

This is actually being discussed at PA at the moment. You can come join the call on we'd afternoon if you like.
Specifically on encounter class and type. Check the agenda to see the trackers. If you think we need another specifically for that change, please log it.
